projectsData.name: ACCAS - Contract Management, Monitoring and Reporting System
projectsData.description: The ACCAS system was proudly developed by the ABLE Team. It is a responsive and high-performance web application designed to streamline the entire lifecycle of contract creation, management, monitoring, and reporting. The system uses React for a dynamic front end and Laravel for a robust back end, with MySQL ensuring reliable and secure data storage. The user interface is built with Shadcn UI, providing a clean, modern, and intuitive experience — making it easy to use for both technical and non-technical users alike.

projectsData.name: ISLP - Internal Software License Portal
projectsData.description: The ISLP (Internal Software License Portal) is a comprehensive web application designed to manage and track software licenses efficiently. It features a complete license lifecycle management system including request approval workflows, expiry tracking with automated notifications, vendor and product management, and detailed usage reporting. Built with React and TypeScript for a robust front end, Laravel for the backend, and MySQL for reliable data storage, the portal provides an intuitive interface using Shadcn UI components for seamless user experience across all management tasks.

projectsData.name: AMS - Assets Management System
projectsData.subtitle: Internal & External
projectsData.description: The AMS (Assets Management System) is a comprehensive asset tracking and management platform designed for both internal and external users. It provides complete asset lifecycle management including backup functionality, data import/export capabilities, requestable items management, and detailed status tracking. The system offers an intuitive dashboard for monitoring asset inventory, configurable settings for customization, and comprehensive labeling for easy asset identification. Built with React and TypeScript for a responsive front-end experience, Laravel for reliable backend operations, and MySQL for secure data storage, AMS delivers a seamless asset management experience with Shadcn UI components ensuring a modern and professional interface.

careerData.description: Designed, developed, and maintained web applications for external clients. Built reusable and efficient front-end and back-end components while collaborating with cross-functional teams on UI, backend logic, and database design.

Contributed to the development and maintenance of internal web applications. Enhanced system features, resolved technical issues efficiently, and worked closely with the development team to meet project milestones.

careerData.location: Papua New Guinea / Marand Family Resort – Bauang, La Union
careerData.description: Developed and maintained internal and client-facing web applications. Implemented new features while fixing bugs and optimizing system performance. Collaborated with senior developers to deliver projects on time and participated in code reviews.
